entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
